text: @realDonaldTrump Oh Mr. Plague President, your cheering crowds have much more to fear from your & their heedlessness about Covid-19 then any protesters outside.  But since when have you cared all that much about the people ... or even much beyond your fragile narcissistic Dunning-Kruger ego.
